testcase.classname: Verifying empty states for products area
testcase.name: A user with no Bots configured will see the Bots tab as an empty state

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given Valid user is logged in...............................................skipped When a user is on the dashboard and clicks the Bots tab.....................undefined Then a user will see bots subscribed but not yet configured, bot set up cards will display.undefined And bot set up cards will include bot name, text "Set up your bot to start trading", and button "Set up".undefined When a user clicks on the Set up button.....................................undefined Then the bot set up page displays...........................................undefined When a user clicks on the "View All Bots" button text.......................undefined Then a user is navigated to the Bots page and is able to view all bots available.undefined
